hdr-123806.def: Proportion of people older than the statutory pensionable age receiving an old-age pension (contributory, noncontributory or both), expressed as a percentage of the eligible population.
hdr-123806.name: Old-age pension recipients
hdr-123806.source: United Nations Statistics Division (2020a). Global SDG Indicators Database. https://unstats.un.org/sdgs/indicators/database/. Accessed 21 July 2020.
hdr-123806.dataset: United Nations Statistics Division (2020a). Global SDG Indicators Database. https://unstats.un.org/sdgs/indicators/database/. Accessed 21 July 2020.
